thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Yolanda R
title: Great Stay
text: During a recent visit with the girlies I can't said enough about our stay at the Roosevelt...upon checking the reception from the staff was prompt and efficient...the Suite was clean and had all of the amenities needed for our stay. The hotel restaurant and bar was an amazing option to have in the evening! I highly recommend this hotel!
